## DateTimeRandom class

Generator for date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DateTimeRandom extends BasicRandom 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BasicRandom](./dw-random.basicrandom.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [database](./dw-random.datetimerandom.database.md) |  | [DateTimeDB](./dw-random.datetimedb.md) | return a random date which format is yyyy-MM-dd |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [date(options)](./dw-random.datetimerandom.date.md) |  | return a random full date [full-date](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6) |
|  [datetime(options)](./dw-random.datetimerandom.datetime.md) |  | return a random date-time (full-data T fulltime) [date-time](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6) |
|  [month(options)](./dw-random.datetimerandom.month.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> return a random month |
|  [time(options)](./dw-random.datetimerandom.time.md) |  | return a random full time [full-time](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6) |
|  [timestamp(options)](./dw-random.datetimerandom.timestamp.md) |  | return a random timestamp |
|  [weekday(options)](./dw-random.datetimerandom.weekday.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> return a random weekday |
